persona.name: Kennedy
persona.bio: Kennedy, a 29-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for their impulsive yet trendsetting approach in the fast-paced world of digital currencies. With years of experience under their belt, Kennedy thrives on the adrenaline of high-stakes trading, often making bold moves that set new market trends. Their intuitive understanding of market dynamics and fearless decision-making have earned them a reputation as a visionary in the crypto community.
